column4: hello can i ask about ssh? if i ssh somewhere could the other computer also access my files?
not unless you have sshd installed and tell it to
so i have to isntall openssh-server to enable ssh access to my pc
yes, it's not magic :) You need the server
but only if you need remote access to your box from elsewhere via ssh
thanks ssh looks cool :) somebody asked me ssh in their computer
you don't need openssh-server unless you need other IP addresses to access your box
the client is for outgoing connections and is installed by default
i see - so if i leave my pc on and know the ip address - i can ssh to it from another location
you might want to use iptables or a front end firewall thing to restrict access to certain IP addresses though
